overview: What would you say to a smoldering brunette clad only in a skin-tight, knit micro mini green lace thigh-highs and black stiletto heels? Avalon's here and she's all ears! One look at lovely Le Le in her green buster and lace gloves will have you right where she wants you begging her to take them off! But there when she does!
title: Hollywood Teasers: Volume 1
